name: Space Ricochet
description:
A solo dev's attempt at developing a game in just under 24 hours for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. 

The idea was a Pinball and Asteroids hybrid where the only control you have over your ship is launching yourself into everything.

Super rough and janky and incomplete, but I hope you enjoy anyway. :)

"Art" and code by me, sound assets from opensource/royalty free sources.
